topic.title: Now Available: Foreign Relations of the United States, 1969-1976, Volume XLII, Vietnam: The Kissinger-Le Duc Tho Negotiations, August 1969–December 1973
topic.body: This volume documents the negotiations between Henry A. Kissinger and Le Duc Tho that led to the Paris Peace Accords on January 27, 1973. It further includes negotiating sessions between Kissinger and Tho conducted in the aftermath of the Agreement in an attempt to achieve a stable cease-fire.
topic.image-description: Book Cover of Foreign Relations of the United States, 1969–1976, Volume XLII, Vietnam: The Kissinger-Le Duc Tho Negotiations, August 1969–December 1973
topic.image-source-information: Created by the Office of the Historian
